original_text: But if I, brothers, still preach circumcision, why am I still being persecuted? In that case the offense of the cross has been removed.
korean_text: 형제들아 내가 지금까지 할례를 전한다면 어찌하여 지금까지 박해를 받으리요 그리하였으면 십자가의 걸림돌이 제거되었으리니

sentences.original_text: But if I, brothers, still preach circumcision,
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 형제들아 내가 아직도 할례를 전파한다면,

sentences.original_text: why am I still being persecuted?
the offense of the cross has been removed.
